channel.title: Histograms on Dimitri Fontaine, PostgreSQL Expert
channel.description: Recent content in Histograms on Dimitri Fontaine, PostgreSQL Expert

item.title: PostgreSQL, Aggregates and Histograms
item.description: In our previous article Aggregating NBA data, PostgreSQL vs MongoDB we spent time comparing the pretty new MongoDB Aggregation Framework with the decades old SQL aggregates. Today, let’s showcase more of those SQL aggregates, producing a nice histogram right from our SQL console.
